input.sentences: you can see it in government buildings
and even normal living buildings in the form of architecture .
sometimes art is in the form of sculptures .
wherever you look | be looking for art . if your mind is open enough | you will see it everywhere .
output.sentences: The Avengers and I made our way through the city in order to stop Thanos! We ran into these meditating men, we had to fight! Scary dudes.
We were then teleported to the congress of deputies building in spain!
We decided to stay at this beautiful hotel.
Once we set out in the morning, Thor could have sworn he recognized the two lion statues. So he took a few pictures.
Then out of know where a fan of mine stopped and asked me for my autograph! Me spiderman, I felt honored.
